SubModule_Description: To use the Light Matrix module add the following import statement to your project:

Function.Function_Signature: write(text: str, intensity: int = 100, time_per_character: int = 500) -> Awaitable
Function.Function_Description: Displays text on the Light Matrix, one letter at a time, scrolling from right to left except if  there is a single character to show which will not scroll

Parameters.Argument_Description: How bright to light up the pixel
How long to show each character on the display

Python_Code.Python_Code:
from hub import light_matrix
# White a message to the hub 
light_matrix.write("Hello, world!")
